summary: An upper-class Bengali family is on vacation in Darjeeling, a popular hill station and resort near Kanchenjungha.
cast: Chhabi Biswas|Karuna Bannerjee|Pahadi Sanyal|Anil Chatterjee|Anubha Gupta|N. Viswanathan|Haridhan Mukherjee|Alakananda Ray|Arun Mukherjee|Subrata Sensharma|Vidya Sinha|Nilima Roy Chowdhuri|Indrani Singh|David Royals|Guinye|Erick Avari
title: Kanchenjungha
